definition.script: pipeline { agent any stages { stage('test'){ steps('test'){ script{ userInput = input(id:'userInput', message: 'Choose jar version ', parameters: [[$class: 'MavenMetadataParameterDefinition', artifactId: 'commons-lang3', classifier:'', credentialsId: '', currentArtifactInfoLabel: '', currentArtifactInfoPattern: '', currentArtifactInfoUrl: '', defaultValue: '', description:'', groupId: 'org.apache.commons', maxVersions: '', name: 'version', packaging: 'jar', repoBaseUrl: 'https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/', sortOrder: 'DESC',versionFilter: '']], submitter:'admin' ,submitterParameter: 'submittedBy'); print("Chosen version : " + userInput) } } } } }
